basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus megaterium AS1.941 (IZ=14 mm), Bacillus subtilis AS1.1087 (IZ=12 mm), Lactobacillus curvatus LTH1174 (IZ=13 mm), Leuconostoc mesenteroides AS1.2 (IZ=10 mm), Leuconostoc dextranicum 181 (IZ=13 mm), Micrococcus flavus NCIB8166 (IZ=21 mm).NOTE:IZ = zone of inhibition.
